perturbation.original_text: Biomass must contain a minimum of six percent (6%) total Cannabidiol (CBD/and or CBDA) and all Biomass must have less than three percent (3%) total TCH content.
perturbation.changed_text: Biomass must have less than three percent (3%) total TCH content.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the minimum CBD content requirement creates a legal risk. Colorado regulations may imply a minimum acceptable CBD level for commercially sold hemp biomass, especially if marketed for CBD extraction. This could lead to disputes and non-compliance with implied quality standards.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potential violation of Colorado regulations regarding hemp product quality and implied warranties of merchantability.

perturbation.original_text: Gridiron and affiliated parties shall indemnify and hold Shi Farms harmless from any claims, losses, actions, damages, liabilities, taxes , obligations, fines, proceedings, deficiencies and out of pocket costs and expenses (including but not limited to attorneys' fees and disbursements) without limitation resulting from or arising out of any inaccuracy or breach of any representation or warranty; any non-performance or any obligation incurred by Gridiron and its affiliated parties. If any claim or legal proceeding is filed by a third party, prompt notice is required by the one to the other.
perturbation.changed_text: Gridiron and affiliated parties shall indemnify and hold Shi Farms harmless from any claims arising out of any obligation incurred by Gridiron and its affiliated parties. If any claim or legal proceeding is filed by a third party, prompt notice may be given.
perturbation.explanation: Significantly narrows the scope of indemnification. Colorado law typically implies a broader scope of indemnification covering negligence or misconduct, removing the requirements for accuracy and breach. The original text covers a broader range of potential liabilities, including those arising from inaccuracies or breaches of warranties and non-performance. By limiting indemnification to only claims 'arising out of any obligation incurred' and removing the mandatory notification, the contract weakens Shi Farms' protection against potential liabilities, contradicting implied legal standards.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potential contradiction of Colorado's implied duty of good faith and fair dealing, and limitation of liability standards.

perturbation.original_text: This will include all Intellectual Property, processes, pricing, and any information that is marked confidential. When the Agreement ends, each party shall return all copies of any such information to the other and take every reasonable measure to preclude its representatives from sharing or keeping such information. Failure to do so shall constitute a material breach of this Agreement with all rights and remedies available to the party whose material has been Disclosed.
perturbation.changed_text: This will include all Intellectual Property, processes, and any information that is marked confidential. When the Agreement ends, each party may return all copies of any such information to the other.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the clauses requiring each party to take reasonable measures to prevent sharing confidential information and specifying that failure to do so is a breach weakens the protection of confidential information. Under Colorado law, implied duties exist to protect confidential information shared under contract; removing these explicit protections could weaken the ability to enforce confidentiality obligations, especially concerning trade secrets.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potential weakening of protections for trade secrets under Colorado Revised Statutes ยง 7-74-102 and implied duties of confidentiality.
